description: List wall information. By default, the wall ID, wall name, facet count, active/total contact count, and position are listed. Use the attribute keyword to list all wall attributes that can be listed. Note: Use the model precision command to change the precision of listed floating point values. The optional range always applies to walls and not facets.

keywords.name: attribute
keywords.description: List wall attributes. If no keyword given, lists available attributes. Attributes are characteristics like velocity, position, displacement. See wall attribute command for complete list

keywords.name: contact
keywords.description: List contacts with wall. Shows: facet ID, contact ID, other piece ID, contact type, activity state, inhibited state, contact model. Default: active contacts only. Use 'all' for active and inactive

keywords.name: extra
keywords.description: List extra variables at index i. Optional 'facet' keyword lists facet extra variables instead of wall extra variables

keywords.name: group
keywords.description: List group names at slot s. Optional 'facet' keyword lists facet group variables instead of wall group variables

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: List facet properties. If no s given, lists available properties for each wall. If s specified, lists value of that property for each facet. Properties represent surface conditions used in contact models

keywords.name: result
keywords.description: List wall model results that have been tabulated. See wall results command for details

examples.description: List basic info for all walls (ID, name, facet count, contacts, position)
List position attribute for all walls
List velocity attribute for all walls
List accumulated displacement for all walls
List available properties for each wall (all properties over all facets)
List 'kn' (normal stiffness) property value for each facet
List extra variable at index 1 for all walls

examples.command: wall list contact all range id 1 10
examples.description: List all contacts (active and inactive) for walls with IDs 1-10
List facet group names in 'Default' slot for all walls

examples.command: wall list attribute spin-z range name 'drum'
examples.description: List z-component of angular velocity for walls named 'drum' (3D)

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: Use Wall object getter methods: wall.pos(), wall.vel(), wall.spin(), wall.disp(), wall.cutoff(), wall.extra(i), wall.group(slot), etc. Access walls via itasca.wall.list(). For contacts: wall.contacts(). For properties: iterate through wall.facets() and use facet.prop(name)
